sentences.en: At bedtime, I take off my clothes and put on pyjamas.
sentences.cn: 在上床的时候, 我脱掉衣服并穿上睡衣.

sentences.en: Can you find my pyjamas, Jenny?
sentences.cn: 你能找到我的睡衣吗, 詹妮?

sentences.en: He had lost his case and had to borrow Tom's pyjamas.
sentences.cn: 他丢失了手提箱,不得不向汤姆借睡衣.

sentences.en: He was sitting there in striped pyjamas.
sentences.cn: 他身着条纹睡衣裤坐在那儿.

sentences.en: Leather pyjamas were all the go last year.
sentences.cn: 宽松的皮裤去年很流行.

sentences.en: My brother was still in his pyjamas.
sentences.cn: 我的兄弟还穿着睡衣裤。

sentences.en: No rational person would go to work in his pyjamas.
sentences.cn: 任何神智正常的人都不会穿着睡衣去上班.

sentences.en: Pyjamas made from flammable material have been removed from most shops.
sentences.cn: 大部分商店都不再出售用易燃材料做的睡衣了.

sentences.en: She was dressed in green and orange pyjamas.
sentences.cn: 她穿着绿色和桔黄色相间的睡衣.
这件睡衣有许多修补过的地方.

sentences.en: What do you think of this kind of pyjamas?
sentences.cn: 您认为这种睡衣 怎么样 ?

sentences.en: Will you please have a look at the pyjamas?
sentences.cn: 请看一下睡衣好 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: a soft pair of trousers and a top that you wear in bed
